verses.verse: To the chief musician. For stringed instruments. A Psalm of Asaph. A Song of Praise. God is known in Judah; His name is great in Israel.
And His abode is in Salem; and His dwelling-place in Zion.
There He broke the fiery arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
You are glorious, more excellent than the mountains of prey.
The stouthearted have been plundered; they slept their sleep; and none of the men of might have found their hands.
By Your rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the horse and chariot are fast asleep.
You, even You, are to be feared; and, Who can stand before You when You are angry?
You have caused judgment to be heard from Heaven; the earth feared and was stilled;
when God arose to judgment, to save all the humble of the earth. Selah.
For the wraths of man thank You; You gird on Yourself the remnant of wraths.
Vow and pay to Jehovah your God; let all that are around Him bring presents to the Fear.
He shall cut off the spirit in rulers; He is terrible to the kings of the earth.
